posts.post_content:
Getting very close on my T 206 Ganley complete backs collection as I have just acquired a nice Hindu back. The only one I have yet to get is Sweet Caporal 150 factory 25.. I thought I would put out a call and see if anyone has one graded or raw they want to get rid of. I have all of the tough ones out of the way hoping this wont take too long.

please PM or email me if you might have something. 
Thanks all..........

Doug,

Congrats on making a run with such a tough common.  Good luck sealing the deal!  Fact. 25 can be pretty tough.

Best,

Andy
Thanks Andy there is one on ebay but its WAY overpriced and I'm not going there..:)
